title: Silver 2 ADC Main Looking for Silver/Gold Ranked Team
body:
Hello Community, I am An ADC Main looking for a team that I can play the Role, you guessed it, ADC.


I consider myself fairly good at ADC, i can use TeamSpeak, Skype and Curse Voice


I have a Champion Pool of these champions :: {{champion:67}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:133}} 


I am 15 years of age
I live in Queensland, Australia
I am available most times
The only real problem is that my internet is a bit dodgy and can disconnect for a maximum of 2 minutes at a time but it isn't very common for that to happen.


Just add me on LoL Client or leave a comment on this post
IGN: An ADC Main

replies.body:
Hey, I've just added you in LoL. 
 Abit about me: 
-15 year old in Melbourne
-I main Mid and Top however i don't really mind what role i play :D
-I'm active most of the time
-Silver 4
